summary.para: Creates a new, empty sprite batch. After creating a sprite batch, use
to add sprites to it, then use to draw it.

param.name: spriteBatch
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a new, empty sprite batch to be populated by the app.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Renders all sprites in the given sprite batch to the device context using the specified drawing options.

param.name: bitmap
param.para: The bitmap from which the sprites are to be sourced. Each sprite’s source rectangle refers to a portion of this bitmap.

param.name: interpolationMode
param.para: The interpolation mode to use when drawing this sprite batch. This determines how Direct2D interpolates pixels within the drawn sprites if scaling is performed.

param.name: spriteOptions
param.para: The additional drawing options, if any, to be used for this sprite batch.

summary.para: Renders part or all of the given sprite batch to the device context using the specified drawing options.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index of the first sprite in the sprite batch to draw.

param.name: spriteCount
param.para: The number of sprites to draw.

param.para: The bitmap from which the sprites are to be sourced. Each sprite's source rectangle refers to a portion of this bitmap.
